00008 string YardEmployeeType::ToString(const string& delim, bool quotes) const {
00009     stringstream strm;
00010     char q = '\'';
00011     
00012     strm 
00013         << GetId() << delim 
00014         << q << GetUserName() << q << delim
00015         << GetTaxId() << delim
00016         << q << GetFirst() << q << delim
00017         << q << GetMiddle() << q << delim
00018         << q << GetLast() << q << delim
00019         << q << GetAddress() << q << delim
00020         << q << GetPhone() << q << delim
00021         << q << GetCity() << q << delim
00022         << q << GetZip() << q << delim
00023         << q << GetPicLocal() << q << delim
00024         << q << GetSigLocal() << q << delim
00025         << q << GetACL() << q << delim
00026         << "1" << delim
00027         << q << GetSince() << q;
00028     
00029     return strm.str();
00030 }
